name: git-hex-backup-refs
title: git-hex backup refs (loose refs)
description: Read loose git-hex backup ref files under .git/refs/git-hex/. Note: refs may be packed (no loose ref files). Expand repoPath to the absolute repo path without a leading slash (e.g., Users/me/repo) and refPath to a path like backup/1700000000_rebaseWithPlan.
